hero.headline: we.trsfrm: Your Website, Transformed.
hero.subHeadline: Get a personalized, high-converting website in minutes, powered by AI. No coding, no hassle, just results.

icon.svg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="feather feather-arrow-right"><line x1="5" y1="12" x2="19" y2="12"></line><polyline points="12 5 19 12 12 19"></polyline></svg>

section.title: Key Features
section.subtitle: What We Offer
section.paragraph: we.trsfrm makes building a website easy and personalized. Here's how:

featuresData.title: AI-Powered Personalization
featuresData.description: Our AI tailors your website content to your specific needs and target audience, ensuring maximum impact.

featuresData.title: Simple Questionnaire
featuresData.description: Just answer a few questions and our AI will generate compelling copywriting and a complete website structure.

featuresData.title: Fast and Efficient
featuresData.description: Get your website up and running in minutes, not days. Spend less time building and more time growing your business.

about.title: About we.trsfrm
about.description: We're a team passionate about helping businesses harness the power of generative AI to create stunning, personalized websites. We believe in transparency, responsibility, and continuous learning.

experience.title: Years of Experience
experience.description: Our team brings years of experience in AI and web development to deliver cutting-edge solutions for your business.

callToAction.description: Join we.trsfrm and experience the future of website creation.

pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
pricing.paragraph: We offer flexible pricing options to suit every need.

testimonial.title: Testimonials
testimonial.subtitle: What Our Customers Say
testimonial.paragraph: Don't just take our word for it. See what our satisfied customers have to say about we.trsfrm.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.content: we.trsfrm made creating my website so easy! I was up and running in minutes, and the AI-powered personalization is amazing.

faq.question: How does the AI work?
faq.answer: Our AI uses advanced algorithms to generate personalized content and website structures based on your answers to a simple questionnaire.

faq.question: Can I customize my website?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You have full control over the content and design of your website.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Team
sectionTitle.title: Meet the Team
sectionTitle.paragraph: We're a team of passionate individuals dedicated to helping businesses succeed online.

sectionTitle.subtitle: Contact
sectionTitle.title: Get in Touch
sectionTitle.paragraph: We'd love to hear from you.
